contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox locomotive | name=GE U28B | powertype=[[Diesel-electric]] | gauge={{RailGauge|ussg}} | builder=[[GE Transportation Systems]] | buildmodel=U28B | aarwheels=B-B | primemover=GE FDL-16 | tractionmotors=GE-752 | rpmrange=650–1050 rpm | topspeed={{convert|70|mph|km/h|abbr=on}} | poweroutput={{convert|2800|hp|kW|abbr=on}} | tractiveeffort={{convert|70000|lbf|kN|abbr=on}} (starting) {{convert|64000|lbf|kN|abbr=on}} (continuous) | builddate=January 1966–January 1967 | totalproduction=148 | image=MILW U28B 5505.jpg | caption=[[Milwaukee Road]] U28B #5505 | imagesize=250px }} The '''GE U28B''' [[diesel-electric locomotive]] model replaced the [[GE U25B|U25B]] in early 1966, featuring a slightly uprated prime mover (only {{convert|300|hp|kW|abbr=on}} more power than the U25B). Early units had the same carbody styling as the U25B, while later units had design features (e.g., shortened nose) more in common with later models. After only a year of production, this model was superseded by the [[GE U30B|U30B]]. ==External links== * Sarberenyi, Robert. ''[http://www.trainweb.org/jaydeet/u28b.htm GE U28B Original Owners]'' ==Original Owners== <br> {| class="wikitable" ! Railroad ! Quantity ! Numbers |- align = "center" |[[Chicago, Burlington and Quincy Railroad]] |20 |106-115, 140-149 |- align = "center" |[[Chicago, Milwaukee, St. Paul and Pacific Railroad]] |17 |130-135, 137-140, 380, 393-398 |- align = "center" |[[Chicago, Rock Island and Pacific Railroad]] |42 |240-281 |- align = "center" |[[General Electric]] (demonstrators) |4 |7025-7028 (to [[Southern Pacific Transportation Company|SP]]) |- align = "center" |[[Great Northern Railway (U.S.)|Great Northern Railway]] |6 |2524-2529 |- align = "center" |[[Louisville and Nashville Railroad]] |5 |2500-2504 |- align = "center" |[[New York Central Railroad]] |2 |2822-2823 |- align = "center" |[[Norfolk and Western Railroad]] |30 |1900-1929 |- align = "center" |[[Pittsburgh and Lake Erie Railroad]] |22 |2800-2821 |- align = "center" |} == References == * {{Marre-diesel-50}} {{GE diesels}} [[Category:General Electric locomotives|U28B]] [[Category:B-B locomotives]] [[Category:Diesel locomotives of the United States]] [[Category:Railway locomotives introduced in 1966]]
